  • Discussed team collaboration and knowledge sharing.

frontmatter.short_title: #24 Go weekly, AI workflows, Team AI demo, Figma-UI with Claude
frontmatter.description: In our OGIF office hour 24 covers AI-driven workflows with Tom, a demo with the Holistic team, and Figma integration with Claude for UI components and Go commentary. Highlights include Agent Zero's data automation capabilities, Figma-to-code conversion, and the benefits of in-office collaboration for efficient knowledge transfer and AI/ML learning.
